node.name: getlogin - return who logged in at this tty
node.description:
Implements the C library function of the same name, which on most systems returns the current login from /etc/utmp, if any. If null, use [perlfunc:getpwuid|getpwuid()]. 

    $login = getlogin || getpwuid($<) || "Kilroy";

Do not consider [perlfunc:getlogin|getlogin()] for authentication: it is not as secure as [perlfunc:getpwuid|getpwuid()].
node.title: perlfunc:getlogin
